and watch it blossom and grow wild....

We love to talk about our problems, and wait for others to solve them.
A hardship that draws you closer to your Maker is a blessing.
The world changes with your example, not your opinion.
Patience is not the ability to wait, but how you act while you are waiting.
These days people don't listen to understand, they listen to reply and argue.
